Name: Trails of Companion Stars
AttributesDescription: A customized 2026 birthday accessory for Rover. This circlet braided from starlight and Resonance Cord now rests in your Backpack, as if it had always been there.
BgDescription: The stars and voices that travel with you are gathered within this circlet-shaped device, their energy preserved and always flowing around you. Both functional and decorative, it stands for praise, honor, and the heartfelt wish from your friends: “May your path ahead be wrapped in light and hope.”
ObtainedShowDescription: Before you even notice, this crown gently finds its way into your Backpack.
